plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 08-1385

                         UNITED STATES,

                            Appellee,

                               v.

                         ALTON SHERMAN,

                           Appellant.


                             ERRATA


     The opinion of this Court issued on December 22, 2008, is
amended as follows:

     On page 12, line 4, change "differs" to "differ".
